Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand needs to win this game to stay in the semi-finals race, while Sri Lanka have already been eliminated from the competition and can spoil the party of Black Caps.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru and will start at 2:00 p.m. as per the Indian standard timing.
Others: The match will be televised on Disney+ Hotstar, Star Sports Networks, and its regional networks in various languages, and live streaming is accessible in the United States via the ESPN+ app and the WillowTV channel.
